com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.adapters

Class NavigationDrawerListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.pvsagar.smartlockscreen.adapters.NavigationDrawerListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class NavigationDrawerListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    Created by aravind on 6/10/14. List adapter to populate the Navigation Drawer used in SmartLockScreen Settings activity. The list is heterogeneous; the user profiles are shown, main items which replace the fragment in the settings activity are shown, and secondary items which launch separate activities are also shown.

    • Constructor Detail

      • NavigationDrawerListAdapter

        public NavigationDrawerListAdapter(android.content.Context context,
                           java.util.List<User> users,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> mainItems,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> mainItemImageRIds,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.String> secondaryItems,
                           java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> secondaryItemImageRIds)
        Constructor which takes in the required data to create list items
        Parameters:
        context - Activity context
        users - List of users to be shown
        mainItems - The names of main items. They are intended to replace the fragment of the settings activity
        mainItemImageRIds - Resource ids of icons for main list items. Should be in the same order as that of the names list.
        secondaryItems - Secondary item names.
        secondaryItemImageRIds - Resource ids of icons for secondary list items. Should be in the same order as that of the names list.
